programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth
programme.desc: As the summer unfolds in the Northern Hemisphere some regions enter their wet season, and some go dry which creates a scarcity for some and bounty for others.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Follow the descent of rivers from their mountain sources to the sea. Witness unique and dramatic moments of animal behaviour, including a piranha frenzy and a showdown between otters and crocodiles.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A humpback whale mother and calf embark on a journey from tropical coral paradises to storm-ravaged polar seas. Indonesian coral reefs reveal seahorses, clams and sea kraits. Bull fur seals attack king penguins, and sea urchins fell forests of kelp.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: In the ocean, life goes to extraordinary lengths to survive this immense realm. A 30-tonne whale shark gorges on a school of fish. Deep sea octopus fly in the abyss and vampire squid use bioluminescence to create a colour display.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Revisit the most memorable scenes from Blue Planet II's seven episodes. Highlights include giant trevally that fly out of the water to snatch seabirds in mid-air and the industrious tuskfish who uses a coral anvil to crack open his clams.

programme.title: The Blue Planet

programme.title: The Blue Planet

programme.desc: Kim's fierce loyalty to her husband becomes a source of conflict while on a trip to Chicago. Kourtney struggles with anxiety in the aftermath of her breakup, so her sisters decide to plan a girls trip to Palm Springs to cure her breakup blues.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kim plans a trip to New York for her husband's appearance on SNL to show Kourtney how far Scott has come as a family man. At the same time, Kim contemplates an unexpected move to Chicago, and Kris fears her mother might be seriously ill.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: The family heads to Bali for a relaxing vacation, but tensions flare when Kourtney accuses Khloe of complaining too much. Scott tries to find buried treasure and enlists the help of his kids. In LA, Kendall and Kylie help their mom care for MJ.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: While on a spiritual quest to find balance in Bali, Kourtney gets some news that makes her consider a future with Scott. Kim and Khloe are determined to have an insightful psychic reading but get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: The Daily Pop
programme.desc: Your go-to for behind-the-scenes scoop, celebrity guests and entertainment conversation.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Khloe’s mistrust of her mother’s boyfriend, Corey, resurfaces on a very awkward family trip to Palm Springs, leaving Kris hurt and confused about her daughter’s behavior. Meanwhile, the family stays with Kendall to escape the fires.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Determined to fulfil one of North's lifelong dreams, Kim puts her survival skills to the test on an overnight camping trip in the wilderness. Malika heads back to Cleveland for the first time since True's birth and suspects Khloe is struggling internally.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Kris reluctantly allows Kim to take over the annual Christmas Eve Party, but the holiday is in jeopardy when Kris learns Kim has invited an unwelcome guest. Khloe must come to the rescue when North’s beloved hamster unexpectedly dies and Kim can’t deal.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Khole tries to mediate a fight between Kourtney and Kendall but only makes things worse. Meanwhile Kris makes herself at home in Kylie's new office space, so Kylie must show her mom who's boss.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: Khloe deals with some debilitating health issues, but her world is turned upside down when rumors surface of Tristan cheating with a close family friend, Jordyn Woods. Kim's husband brings his family and friends together.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Kardashians
programme.desc: After Tristan’s shocking betrayal, Kim and Kourtney take Khloe on a getaway to help her cope with the news. Khloe’s anger reaches a boiling point when she learns that Jordyn is speaking publicly about what happened.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: Julie is excited to start her new food blog but when no one 'likes' her page, she and Todd go on a food journey, which takes them from fine French cuisine to foraging for their own food.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: With Todd's birthday fast approaching, he begins to obsess about his age and reject getting older, but with the help of Mama Faye and her friends, he begins to accept the future.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: Grayson decides he wants to be a real city slicker for his 9th birthday, and persuades his entire family to stay overnight at a working dude ranch, where they will test how country the Chrisleys really are.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: Chase and Savannah are ecstatic to embark on a family graduation trip to London, much to the chagrin of Todd, a creature of habit who's never left the country.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: When Todd takes his family to the English countryside, he insists on turning the Chrisleys into a proper English family but when the family resists, Todd goes to great lengths to prove he's a royal.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: When Todd and Julie prepare to make a 'day in the life' anniversary video, the cracks in their marriage begin to show and they scramble to reinvent themselves as the 'perfect' couple.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: Every summer the Chrisleys attend a family friend's annual sports day BBQ, and every year they are put to shame. Determined to break their losing streak, Todd's competitive spirit pushes his family to their breaking points.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: The Chrisleys head to their South Carolina lake house, which also happens to be in the town where Todd grew up. Todd decides the kids are in need of a family history lesson, but the kids end up turning it around on him.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: Chase and Savannah have just graduated high school, and a celebration is in the works. As spirits run high, Todd plans on surprising Savannah by inviting her boyfriend Blaire. She has decided to take a break from him, however, threatening Todd's plans.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best
programme.desc: Disappointed that he missed Savannah being crowned Miss Tennessee Teen USA, Todd plans a party to celebrate. Later, tension builds when it becomes clear the party is more for Todd than Savannah.

programme.title: Chrisley Knows Best

programme.title: Athletic Bilbao x Valencia
programme.desc: Pela 22ª rodada, o Athletic Bilbao recebe o Valencia no estádio San Mamés. O Bilbao tenta se recuperar da última derrota. O adversário busca a segunda vitória consecutiva para ultrapassar o rival.

programme.title: Além da Bola
programme.desc: O jogador conta histórias engraçadas da vida de atleta.

programme.title: Sevilla x Getafe
programme.desc: Pela 22ª rodada, o Sevilla recebe o Getafe no estádio Ramón Sanchéz Pizjuán. O time da casa busca a quinta vitória seguida para quem sabe assumir a vice-liderança. O adversário não vence há duas partidas e tenta se recuperar.

programme.title: Palmeiras x Santos
programme.desc: Palmeiras e Santos decidem o principal título da América do Sul no estádio do Maracanã. O único triunfo alviverde na competição foi em 1999, já o Peixe busca o tetracampeonato do torneio. A última conquista do Santos foi em 2011 com Neymar em campo.

programme.title: Moto GP
programme.desc: Acompanhe todos os destaques e resultados das provas de Moto GP.

programme.title: AZ Alkmaar x Ajax
programme.desc: Acompanhe as partidas do Campeonato de Futebol Holandês.

programme.title: Athletic Bilbao x Valencia
programme.desc: Pela 22ª rodada, o Athletic Bilbao recebe o Valencia no estádio San Mamés. O Bilbao tenta se recuperar da última derrota. O adversário busca a segunda vitória consecutiva para ultrapassar o rival.

programme.title: Manchester United x Everton
programme.desc: Pela 23ª rodada, o Manchester United recebe o Everton no estádio Old Trafford. Os Red Devils buscam a segunda vitória seguida para se aproximar mais da liderança. Os Toffees também vêm de um resultado positivo.

programme.title: Fulham x West Ham
programme.desc: Pela 23ª rodada, o Fulham recebe o West Ham no estádio Craven Cottage. Os Cottagers são a primeira equipe na zona de rebaixamento e tentam se recuperar dos últimos resultados. Os Hammers buscam a segunda vitória consecutiva.

programme.title: Huesca x Real Madrid
programme.desc: Pela 22ª rodada, o Huesca recebe o Real Madrid no Estádio El Alcoraz. O time da casa é o lanterna da competição e busca a segunda vitória consecutiva. O Real tenta se recuperar da última derrota para voltar para vice-liderança.

programme.title: Atlético de Madrid x Celta de Vigo
programme.desc: Pela 22ª rodada, o Atlético de Madrid recebe o Celta de Vigo no estádio Wanda Metropolitano. Os Colchoneros buscam mais uma vitória para continuar com tranquilidade na liderança. O Celta não vence há, pelo menos, cinco jogos e tenta se recuperar.

programme.title: Betis x Barcelona
programme.desc: Pela 22ª rodada, o Betis recebe o Barcelona no estádio Benito Villamarín. O time de Sevilha tenta se aproximar mais da primeiras colocações. O Barça busca se manter na vice-liderança da competição.

programme.title: Kansas City Chiefs x Tampa Bay Buccaneers
programme.desc: Os Buccaneers enfrentam os Chiefs no Super Bowl 55. O Tampa Bay derrotou o Green Bay na final da NFC, enquanto o Kansas City venceu o Buffalo na disputa da AFC. Os Bucs são os primeiros a jogarem um Super Bowl no seu próprio estádio.

programme.title: Mundo Premier League
programme.desc: Um panorama completo sobre o Campeonato Inglês ao redor do mundo. As últimas notícias, curiosidades, entrevistas com jogadores e técnicos e histórias sobre a paixão do torcedor pelo futebol inglês.

programme.desc: A long-time customer wants to make a statement by having his stock 2017 F250 Platinum 4x4 lifted and made off-road ready. The boys from Texas are happy to oblige with a handmade 22-inch lift on 42-inch custom tires.
